relics.name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
description: (2) Increases Lightning DMG by 10%.
(4) When the wearer uses Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

relics.name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
description: (2) Increases Physical DMG by 10%.
(4) After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

relics.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
description: (2) Increases Wind DMG by 10%.
(4) After the wearer uses Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

relics.name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
description: (2) Increases Fire DMG by 10%.
(4) Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for next attack.

relics.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
description: (2) Increases Quantum DMG by 10%.
(4) When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

relics.name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
description: (2) Reduces DMG taken by 8%.
(4) At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50% of their Max HP, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

relics.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
description: (2) Increases Ice DMG by 10%.
(4) After the wearer unleashes their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

relics.name: Knight of Purity Palace
description: (2) Increases DEF by 15%.
(4) Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the shield created by the wearer by 20%.

relics.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
description: (2) ATK increases by 12%.
(4) The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

relics.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
description: (2) Increases Outgoing Healing by 10%.
(4) At the beginning of the battle, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point.

relics.name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
description: (2) Increases Break Effect by 16%
(4) Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

relics.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
description: (2) Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%.
(4) When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

relics.name: Belobog of the Architects
description: (2) Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

relics.name: Celestial Differentiator
description: (2) Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

relics.name: Fleet of the Ageless
description: (2) Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

relics.name: Inert Salsotto
description: (2) Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

relics.name: Pan-Galactic Commercial Enterprise
description: (2) Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

relics.name: Space Sealing Station
description: (2) Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

relics.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
description: (2) Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

relics.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
description: (2) Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.
